channel.title: Donator rank considered
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Please move if needed![/size]
Is buying donator rank considered "real world trading"?

item.title: Donator rank considered
item.dc:creator: @gergy008 gergy008
item.description:
@gergy008 wrote:

Real world yes, But I’m not sure if it is trading, mainly because it’s a donation and the other party is not giving anything back (Apart from the services it already offers). I’d say no, but someone will prove me otherwise.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator rank considered
item.dc:creator: @saadmboy saadmboy
item.description:
@saadmboy wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:1, topic:409238”][size=36pt]Please move if needed![/size]

Is buying donator rank considered “real world trading”?[/quote]
Do u mean a servers donator rank or moparscapes donator rank (they shud have 1).
If a servers donator rank yes its considered real world trading like ^^^ said.
If ur thinking of moparscape donator rank they dont have 1 (or ive never seen a person with one)

Read full topic
